This method is used when there is an action performed by the user through an input device.

button() - Method in class DisplayScreen
 

C

changeQuantity() - Method in class GroceryStore
The changeQuantity method is used to change the number of selected food they want.
checkOut() - Method in class GroceryStore
The checkOut method is used to add the food the user has chosen to their fridge and decrement the points the CritterSitter has.
checkUpHealth() - Method in class Doctor
The checkUpHealth method is used to calculate the health of the critter and get it's foodGroupCount.
close() - Method in class Pamphlet
The close method closes the pamphlet.
Critter - Class in <Unnamed>
The Critter class is the class that creates the actual critter.
Critter(String, String, String) - Constructor for class Critter
The Critter constructor creates a critter sitter with the specified name, colour and genetic disease.
CritterSitter - Class in <Unnamed>
The CritterSitter class is the class that creates the critter sitter (or the user in this case) who will take care of the critter.
CritterSitter(String, int, int) - Constructor for class CritterSitter
The CritterSitter constructor creates a critter sitter with the specified name, difficulty and character.
CritterSitterApp - Class in <Unnamed>
The CritterSitterApp is the driver class that creates CritterSitterApp as well as executes the program.
CritterSitterApp() - Constructor for class CritterSitterApp
CritterSitterApp method is used to create the CritterSitterApp object in RAM while passing the String title, this also creates 3 menu items of Quit, Help and About which can be accessed through the 2 menus of File and Help respectively.It also adds the 5 items to the actual menu which is created and called 'myMenus'.Finally, this method sets the performance window to 400, 400 and visible to the user.It also ensures the window will closed when the user pushes the 'x' button.
CritterSitterApp(String, String, int) - Constructor for class CritterSitterApp
 
currentScores - Variable in class HighScores
 

D

dialog(String, String, int) - Method in class CritterSitterApp
This method is used if the a button was clicked.It will create a new performance window with a title and specific dimensions and layout, and if the button created is clicked, it will close the output console.
diseases - Variable in class Doctor
 
displayRec() - Method in class Recreation
The displayRec method is used to show the graphics of the recreation game.
displayScores() - Method in class HighScores
The displayScores method reads the high scores from the file HighScores.txt, ensures that there are scores in there and displays them.
DisplayScreen - Class in <Unnamed>
The DisplayScreen class is the class that extends the JPanel and all the graphics goes on it.

The DisplayScreen constructor is used to create the background image.

R

Recreation - Class in <Unnamed>
The Recreation class is the class that lets the user play the 'mini-game' of fetch where the user's critter goes to a designated shape and then answers a question at that shape regarding healthy food choices and nutrition.
